Name: XXZ: XXL
About the game: Zombie Apocalypses turned out to be somewhat different from what science fiction authors used to write. Only women can turn into zombies. Day Z caught you in one of the biggest strip clubs in Las Vegas. You are gathering a group of three people in order to escape the city. The fight system is based on “match 3” principle. Stunning zombie girls. /
